name: Pollen – WPBakery Page Builder Addons
author: Visualmodo

sections.description:
Pollen – WPBakery Page Builder Addons allows you to create amazing pages from ready to use templates with a single click only.

Bundled with super useful WPBakery Page Builder elements with a bunch of options to achieve any design with all the power of WPBakery Page Builder for free. In addition to elegant and modern components for your page content.

You can build amazing professional layouts for your site with tons of powerful shortcodes. Works with latest WPBakery Page Builder v5.2.x+

Pollen Addon Feautres

  • Fully customizable elements
  • Custom icons upload and management options
  • Complete color customization option
  • Advanced options panel
  • Complete color customization option
  • Drag and drop page builder components
  • Fully responsive visual elements

Check plugin online usage documentation.
sections.installation:
Install Pollen as a regular WordPress plugin. Firstly, you need to install and activate the WPBakery Page Builder WordPress plugin, this installation it’s essential for a WPBakery Page Builder addons usage.

Secondly, you can download the Pollen WordPress plugin .ZIP files here and got to WordPress Dashboard. Plugins. Add New. Upload. Hit ‘Chose file’. Select ‘pollen.zip’ file. Upload and activate the plugin. Moreover, you can install the plugin without the needs of files. Directly on the WordPress dashboard. Go to Plugin. Add New. Search for ‘Pollen’ and click on the ‘Install’ button. Finally, click on ‘activate’.

Pollen – WPBakery Page Builder Addons works like other page builder addon plugin. Go to ‘Pages. ‘Add new’ then click on WPBakery Page builder then click on Add Element. So you should see Page Builder Addons tab as Name “Pollen” on Menu Top. Finally, click on it you will see a growing elements list of all the plugin drag and drop components.

  • Update – Preparing plugin to be deactivated and replaced by Borderless. Step 1 of 3.

1.0.7

  • Update – Preparing plugin to be deactivated and replaced by Visualmodo Elements. Step 1 of 3.

  • Update – Changelog.

1.0.5

  • Added – Alert Component.

1.0.4

  • Added – Modal Component.
  • Fixed – List Group Background Color.
  • Fixed – Compatibility between Pollen and Visual Elements Plugin.

1.0.3

  • Added – Exclusive Animation System.
  • Added – Pollen CSS File Minified.

1.0.2

  • Added – Infobox Component.

1.0.1

  • Fixed – Testimonial blockquote changed for p
  • Added – SVG Component

1.0.0

  • Initial Release.
